message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $15,000  to start negotiations. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate you seeing the value in this product.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to meet your price, but I'm willing to go up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a fair agreement.
